name: Duskborne Castle
description:
The Duskborne Castle only appears during a full moon. No one dares to enter the castle of the evil witch, until the princess was taken hostage. It is now your duty, together with two other heroes, to sneak into the castle and save the princess.

Note: This is a puzzle game with a short story line added into it. It is made for studying purposes only and therefore is not completed. The puzzle ideas does not belong to me. It's from one of my favorite games, Professor Layton VS Phoenix Wright.

Special thanks to the CCs out there:
Art: Kenney
(Note: No SFX or music yet)
Made with Unity, Tiled, Tiled2Unity
